ti:edition.ti:label: Epitome Rerum Romanorum
ti:edition.ti:description: Florus, Lucius Annaeus. Lucius Annaeus Florus, Epitome of Roman history. Cornelius Nepos. Forster, E. S. (Edward Seymour), editor. Rolfe, John C., editor. London, New York: William Heinemann, G. P. Putnam's Sons, 1929 (printing).
